text: Arthur Harold Smith was a Welsh footballer who played as a goalkeeper in the Football League for Wrexham. == Personal life == Smith's brother Cecil was also a footballer. == Career statistics == {| class="wikitable" style="text- align: center" |+Appearances and goals by club, season and competition ! rowspan="2" |Club ! rowspan="2" |Season ! colspan="3" |League ! colspan="2" |FA Cup ! colspan="2" |Other ! colspan="2" |Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |Macclesfield |1930–31 |Cheshire County League |14 |0 |2 |0 |1Appearance in Cheshire Senior Medal Competition |0 |17 |0 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !14 !0 !2 !0 !1 !0 !17 !0 |} == References == Category:Footballers from Wrexham Category:Welsh footballers Category:Wrexham A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Year of birth unknown Category:Year of death unknown Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Macclesfield Town F.C. players
title: Arthur Smith (Welsh footballer)
